page.title: 07CLUBS
page.content:
We have one club in Langtree which is the Social Club.There is a snooker table, skittle alley and a darts board in the Social Club.The club run 3 mens' and 2 ladies' skittle teams. A snooker competition is held annualy and whist drives every Thursday. The Green Dragon run darts and pool teams. The W.I. and Mothers' Union meet once a month. There is a Friendship Club for the over 60's every fortnight.
For other clubs people have to go out of the village.The nearest Cubs, Scouts, Brownies and Guides are at
Shebbear or Torrington. There is a Tens-fourteens club held at Stibb Cross.The British Legion also meets monthly at Stibb Cross.
